name: Ninja Raijin
description:
Ninja Raijin is a technical Demo where you control a ninja who explore a mysterious tower in traditional Japan. There is no real goal in the game, apart from exploring and appreciate the atmosphere and aesthetic of the place. The character can perform some moves like a double jump or even use a grapple on some surfaces.

Explore the tower and become the Ninja Raijin !

_______________________________________________________________________________________

This game was made by Romain Guyon, Quentin Janet, David Lovo, Axel Métaux and Romain Paolillo. 

We own every assets and textures. We don't own the skybox, made by Key Mouse (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/customizable-sky...) And the animations, downloaded on Mixamo (https://www.mixamo.com/).

Level music is from Mini Ninja 

Don't hesitate to leave feedback !
